summary: Mod adds a new item, a craftable and enchantable Telvanni hood, to the game. It also allows you to craft Telvanni clothing robes and armoured robes. All items are enchantable. All races covered.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/NiOfNaG.png[/img]

Mod adds a new item, a craftable and enchantable Telvanni hood, to the game. It also allows you to craft Telvanni clothing robes and armoured robes. All items are enchantable.

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/articles/50156/?][/url][b][color=#e69138][color=red][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65163/?][/url][/b][/color][/color][/b][b][color=#e69138][color=red][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65163/?][/url][/b][/color][/color][/b][color=#cc4125][size=6][b][/b][/size][/color][color=#cc4125][b][size=6]Mod works as intended, so don't expect any updates.[/size]
[b][size=4]I don't develop old mods any more.
[/size][/b]
[url=https://www.facebook.com/elianorapwnsu][img]http://i.imgur.com/267fYFk.png[/img][/url]
[url=https://www.youtube.com/c/Elianora][img]http://i.imgur.com/bGTVC9s.png[/img]
[/url][/b][/color]____________________________________________

[color=#e06666][b][size=4]:: REQUIREMENTS ::[/size][/b]
[/color]
- Skyrim.esm
- Update.esm
- Dragonborn.esm

[b][color=#cc4125][size=4]:: GENERAL ::[/size][/color][/b]

• All races and both genders supported

• Craft the basic clothing items at the tanning rack, then take the clothing items to the forge along with some Refined Moonstone to armour the hood and robes. Armoured robes can be improved with even more moonstone and smithing skill.

• The robes and hood are leather class

____________________________________________________________________________________

[b][color=#cc4125][size=4]:: RECOMMENDED MODS ::Â [/size][/color][/b]

• [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35776/]Telvanni Robes HD Retexture - 6 colours [/url]

• [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35329/]Cultist HD Retexture[/url]

• [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35252/]Miraak HD Retexture - Champion of Mora - Disciple of Talos[/url]

• [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35089/]Archmage of Winterhold HD Retexture[/url]

• [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34914/]Psijic Robes Retexture - Keeper of the Ogma HD[/url]

____________________________________________________________________________________

Enjoy! And please send you screenshots, I love to see them!

[img]http://i.imgur.com/9dz0cWK.png?[/img][/center]
author: Rafuel - Elianora
